statements: SELECT * FROM UserVerification;
SELECT user_id, username FROM UserVerification WHERE is_verified = TRUE;
SELECT username, verification_code FROM UserVerification ORDER BY verification_code DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserVerification WHERE username LIKE '%John%';
SELECT user_id, username, is_verified FROM UserVerification WHERE is_verified = FALSE ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserVerification WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT username, verification_code FROM UserVerification WHERE is_verified = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM UserVerification WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT username FROM UserVerification WHERE password LIKE '%123%' AND is_verified = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM UserVerification ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE verified = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM sessions ORDER BY expiry_timestamp DESC;
SELECT session_id, user_id, session_token FROM sessions WHERE session_token LIKE 'abc%' AND expiry_timestamp > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE verified=TRUE;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE NOT verified;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE is_verified = true;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM login_attempts ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE is_verified = true;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_attempts FROM login_attempts GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT users.user_id, users.username, verification_codes.created_at FROM users INNER JOIN verification_codes ON users.user_id = verification_codes.user_id;
SELECT users.username, login_attempts.ip_address, login_attempts.login_time FROM login_attempts INNER JOIN users ON login_attempts.user_id = users.user_id WHERE login_attempts.success = false;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'joh%';
SELECT * FROM verification_tokens WHERE is_expired = FALSE;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM wallet ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, email, username FROM users ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT u.username, w.balance FROM users u JOIN wallet w ON u.user_id = w.user_id;
SELECT u.username, r.reset_token FROM users u LEFT JOIN reset_tokens r ON u.user_id = r.user_id WHERE r.created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, password_hash FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_sessions ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM wallet_transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM user_sessions ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, verification_code FROM verification_codes WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, amount, transaction_type FROM wallet_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
